method.name: PUT
method.doc: To update an already installed extension with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the extensions URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: extension_support_package
param.doc: The name of the extension support package to install (as an application/octet-stream).

param.name: config_data
param.doc: Configuration data related to the extension (as multipart/form-data).

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
